'''1.3.12''', the first release of the '''[[Boss Update]]''',<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004126632|title=Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition - 1.3|date=January 31, 2018}}</ref>  is a major update to {{el|ds}} that was released on January 30–31, 2018. It adds many new features, such as [[beacon]]s, [[ocean monument]]s, and [[guardian]]s, as well as the [[wither]] and [[elder guardian]].
